It is characterized by its unique four-leaf structure, which is rare and considered a symbol of good luck. The plant typically grows in arid and semi-arid regions, adapting to dry environments with its succulent leaves. Tetralopha is often cultivated for ornamental purposes due to its distinctive foliage.
